department.dept_long_name: Department of Slavic Languages and Literatures

course.title: Nabokov: A Cross-Cultural Perspective after the Cold War
course.description: Examines Nabokov's poetry, novels, short stories and essays from Russian, European and American periods. Attention to issues of literary modernism, play, cultural translation and memory in the wake of the Cold War. Additional readings from Chekhov, Proust, Borges, and others.
course.notes: Knowledge of Russian is not required but additional section for those wishing to read some texts in Russian might be organized.
